name: Sailing Sands
description:
For McGameJam 2022  - "Journey into the Unknown"

Take you sand glider out for a ride through the desert, seeking the oasis and encountering vestiges of former expeditions along the way.

Credits:

SFX - freesounds.org and SideArm Studios

Normal and AO maps - 3Dtextures.me

Heightmap data - Tangram Heightmapper

Skybox - Render Knight
